Cell.Data: %main_jose% is eager to in meet with you, <player>. Would you be able to pay him a visit at %tor_office% in %toronto%?

<player>, I must admit it, you have been doing a wonderful job for us. When I first heard of your efforts, I was skeptical, but then again, I am skeptical by nature. In any event, I am most pleased with the direction you have taken the company. I am confident you will be able to earn the remaining endorsements - in fact I am ready to tell you how you can do so now.

Alex has supported you from the get go, and you have already earned the trust of Evangeline, Deiter and Felix. You only have myself and Whitney left to convince. I'll let Whitney explain what she would like to see you accomplish - as for me, I have been working with Brooke, the boss of our factory here in Toronto, on some enhancements for Felix's coffee machines. We are now set up and ready to launch a line of Blended Coffees.

I'd like you to help me convince the other members of the board that we can be successful with these products. I need you to not only nearly fill the Coffee Blends page of our recipe book, but also to have [D|$3,000,000|$4,500,000|$7,500,000] in the bank. Once you have accomplished these things, I will gladly confer my endorsement.
Collect 11 recipes for Coffee Blends and have at least [D|$3,000,000|$4,500,000|$7,500,000] on hand to earn Joseph's endorsement.
Terrific work, <player>. I've been saving this final blends recipe for you...
And, as promised, I am fully on board with you becoming our %rank_4% - you have earned my endorsement, <player>. Keep up the great work!
You're on the right track, <player>. Keep going until you've met the goals we discussed - [D|$3,000,000|$4,500,000|$7,500,000] in your account and 11 Coffee Blends recipes collected...
I'd like you to go see Whitney in Wellington. Bring her a sample from your first batch of Coffee Blends. Here is the first recipe that you will need...
Just bring her [D|a case|10 cases|25 cases] of those %m01%, and she'll let you know what she has in mind.
Bring [D|a case|10 cases|25 cases] of %m01% to %main_whit% at %wel_factory% in %wellington%.
My first cousin Joseph told me that he had given you a recipe and prepared the Toronto factory to make %m01%, and that you were planning to offer me a taste? Does this ring any bells, <player>?
Tasty! I agree with Joseph - I think your new line of Coffee Blends are going to do wonderfully for our company!

All right, , step inside and let's crank up these machines!

Our belts are a bit wider than Felix's down in %capetown%, to accommodate more ingredients. But I think you'll get the hang of things in no time flat...

Our factory here is configured for Exotics - my own favorite treats. It is also important to me that you are continuing to show success with your own creations. I will endorse your promotion to %rank_4%, and give you an excellent exotic recipe, once you have learned all the other 11 Exotics recipes, as well as created at least [D|7|8|9] confections of your own.
Learn 11 Exotics recipes, and invent at least [D|7|8|9] recipes of your own, to gain Whitney's endorsement.

You are doing a truly magnificent job, <player>. It is my pleasure to offer you the final exotics recipe - for %e12% - and, more importantly, my endorsement of your abilities to lead our company into the future. Nice work!

I am going to ask you to return Joseph's favor, and to bring him a sample of your first batch of Exotics. This is a truly sophisticated factory - you've got 3 colors to match, and a recycler just in case. Good luck!
Bring [D|a case|10 cases|25 cases] of %e01% to %main_jose% at %tor_office% in %toronto%.
You have seen Whitney, correct? And she gave you a recipe for %e01%, right? She assured me that you would be bringing me a sample to try...
Tasty! You are really on a tear, <player>, launching new product types fast and furious! I have no doubt that you will succeed in all you set out to accomplish.

I happen to know a lady who is holding a pair of exotics recipes. Her name is Keylla, and you'll find her at the %lim_plaza% in %lima%, Peru. To influence her to share them, I suggest you should bring her [D|5 dozen|90|150] cases of %t06%, and then she'll set you up.
Deliver [D|60|90|150] cases of %t06% to someone named Keylla at %lim_plaza% in %lima%.
I'm happy to see you <player>, I've heard wonderful things about your confections. In particular, I heard I might really enjoy some %t06%...
%lim_plazakeep% is holding a couple of recipes for exotics for you. As long as you show up with [D|60|90|150] cases of %t06%, she'll be willing to share what she's got.

I am impressed, - your %t06% are delicious.

I have a couple of exotics recipes that I would be willing to part with. I tell you what - I'll hand over the first one now, and when you bring me [D|50|75|125] cases of those, I'll hand over the second. OK?
Excellent - here's the recipe, and I look forward to receiving the [D|50|75|125] cases.
Bring [D|50|75|125] cases of %e03% to Keylla at %lim_plaza% in %lima%.
Perfect! Here is the other recipe I mentioned.

You know, it is funny. I have recognized seeing you and %main_alex% coming into Peru lately. She's looking for her husband, Sean, right?

Well, I've heard of what Schokolade Weltreich is really trying to do behind the scenes. I did see %evil_wolf% pass around here a month or two ago. He is not a kind man. You should stay away from him if you're travelling around, because he does have some tricks upon his sleeve...
You've got the recipe, right? You do want the other recipe, right? Well, you need to bring me those [D|50|75|125] cases of %e03%...
%lim_plazakeep% is holding another recipe for you. Once you show up with [D|50|75|125] cases of %e03%, she'll be willing to share what she's got.

I'm glad I ran into you, <player>. My friend Keylla told me that she had given you a recipe for %e02%. I happen to be able to offer you passage to the only place on earth where you'll be able to find the %date% you need for that recipe. If I can get you there, as well as promise a couple of recipes in return, will you be willing to bring me [D|50|75|125] cases of %e02%?

Great. I'm actually on my way to Keylla's place in Peru. I'll meet you there, at %lim_plaza%, and as soon as you arrive with [D|50|75|125] cases of %e02%, I'll hand over the other recipes.

In the meantime, you can now travel to %gobidesert%, where you'll find the %date% you need...
Bring [D|50|75|125] cases of %e02% to %trav_05% at %lim_plaza% in %lima%.
You have outdone yourself, <player>. Here are the recipes I promised. I'll be seeing you on the road, I'm sure...
Here I am, as promised. You made a promise, too, <player>, do you remember? That's right - [D|50|75|125] cases of %e02%.
%trav_05% is waiting at %lim_plaza% with a couple of Exotics recipes for you, <player>. She is eager for you to arrive with the [D|50|75|125] cases of %e02% she is expecting...
I am glad you were able to get some %m01% to Whitney. Are you willing to do me another favor right now? It will help us start to build out our Blends offerings...

Super. I'm going to give you a couple more Blends recipes. I want you to take [D|20|50|100] cases of each of %m01%, %m02% and %m03% to my brother Felix in %capetown%. That's [D|60|150|300] cases total.
Bring [D|20|50|100] cases each of %m01%, %m02% and %m03% to %main_feli% in %capetown%.

Let me taste what you have there, <player>...scrumptious! I'm going to just take a couple of cases of each of those Blends - the rest you should be able to sell at a healthy profit. I'm on board with Blends - here are a couple of additional recipes that I think will also prove quite worth your while to produce...
I'm willing to consider expansion into the realm of Blends, but I need to taste first hand some of the products coming out of Joseph's machinery up there in Toronto.
You need to bring [D|20|50|100] cases each of %m01%, %m02% and %m03% to %main_feli% in %capetown% in order to get him comfortable with the expansion of the business into Blends.

<player>, I have been trying to get a hold of some of your special creations. I can offer a healthy sum, paid in advance - as well as a couple of recipes - one exotic, one coffee blend - in exchange for some of your concoctions. Shall we make a deal?

Sweet! OK, here's [D|$100,000|$150,000|$250,000]. I'll track you down in a few months, and by that time please have on hand for me [D|35|60|100] cases each of your <user4> and <user5>. When you give me the confections, I'll give you the recipes I mentioned.
Have [D|35|60|100] cases each of <user4> and <user5> on hand for %trav_06%.
Ah, people of their word are so few and far between these days! It is my pleasure to give you these recipes now...

You will find %rose% at the market in %zurich%, and as for the %m06%, I understand there are now some wonderful %coconut% to be had in %bali%. I'm not sure if you've ever had occasion to visit Indonesia?
I paid you in advance, <player>, and I expect that you will honor your end of our bargain, right?
%trav_06% is expecting [D|35|60|100] cases each of your <user4> and <user5>, for which he paid you in advance.

It is good to see you again, <player>. As I've always said through my life, I've always had friends in the chocolate world. If you are willing to make a trip to South America, I have a friend there who is in possession of some valuable recipes that utilize some local ingredients. Are you available to do something for me right now?
Wonderful. First, here is a recipe for %m10%...

Make [D|25|40|60] cases and bring them along with [D|65|100|150] cases of %t09% to my friend Pedro, whom you'll find in the %bog_mountain% in %bogota%. As far as I'm aware, the %sesame% you'll need can now be found in %tangiers%.
Bring [D|25|40|60] cases of %m10% and [D|65|100|150] cases of %t09% to Pedro in %bogota%.

These truffles are delightful, <player>, and I look forward to enjoying your %m10%! In appreciation, I have a recipe for you here, for %e10%. %pecan% can be found here at %bog_market%, but let me warn you - they are only in season from around September through November, and at other times of year you'll pay a pretty penny for those nuts...
My friend Evangeline gave me a head's up that you would be calling to visit, but she said something about truffles and coffee blends you'd have for me?
%bog_mountainkeep% is expecting you to visit him at %bog_mountain% in %bogota% with [D|65|100|150] cases of %t09% and [D|25|40|60] cases of %m10%...

By the way, I do happen to know where you can get a hold of a couple of additional recipes here in Colombia. You should bring [D|a dozen cases|30 cases|50 cases] of your delicious %i11%, as well as [D|a dozen cases|30 cases|50 cases] of %e10%, to %bog_churchkeep% here at %bog_church%.
Give [D|12|30|50] cases each of %e10% and %i11% to %bog_churchkeep% in %bogota%.

Pedro was singing your praises, <player>, but I must say his words did not do your confections justice! Here are a couple of additional recipes for exotics that I think you will find especially lucrative...
Pedro has been telling me all kinds of wonderful things about your offerings, <player> - I do have some recipes for you if you show up with the products I'm expecting...
%bog_churchkeep% at %bog_church% in %bogota% is holding a couple of recipes for you, <player> - she'll exchange them for [D|12|30|50] cases of %e10% and [D|12|30|50] cases of %i11%...
<player>, you need to make your way to %lasvegas% and see %las_marketkeep% there. Word is that she won a valuable recipe, and would be willing to part with it for a very reasonable amount...
It's no wonder - it's your lucky day! Here's a recipe for %m07% - no strings attached. Enjoy!

Ah, <player>, you must have heard of my good fortune? I indeed have a proposal for you. For just [D|$25,000|$40,000|$65,000], I will sell you the recipe for %e07%, a delightful concoction that benefits from some of the fine %whiskey% I sell right here. But wait, there's more: I also know of a way for you to acquire yet another recipe once you make a few dozen cases of these chocolates. Will you buy the recipe?
Excellent. I'll grab the [D|$25,000|$40,000|$65,000] and give you the recipe. What you need to do is bring [D|78|116|172] cases of the finished product to %dou_shopkeep% in %douala%. Good luck!
Bring [D|78|116|172] cases of %e07% to %dou_shopkeep% at %dou_shop% in %douala%.
Your %e07% are simply divine. In exchange for the first [D|78|116|172] cases, I will now give you a recipe for %e09%...
I have a recipe for you, <player>, as well as an opportunity to discuss, as soon as you bring [D|78|116|172] cases of %e07% - the recipe you bought from %las_marketkeep% in Vegas.
You are on the hook for [D|78|116|172] cases of %e07%, which you must deliver to %dou_shopkeep% at %dou_shop% in %douala%...

I'm not sure if Claudia mentioned this to you, <player>, but I have been looking for a partner for my shop. You have continued to impress me with your creations, and at this point I am willing to sign ownership of this shop over to you, in exchange for [D|100|150|250] cases of the recipe I gave you - %e09% - as well as [D|100|150|250] cases each of %c06% and your <user2>. Do we have a deal?
Exchange [D|100|150|250] cases each of %e09%, %c06% and <user2> for %dou_shop%.

Wonderful. This shop is now yours - you will from this point forward always get the very best prices for your goods, and I will be happy to pass along any Special Orders I happen to receive on your behalf!
I've got the deed to my shop, and I am ready to sign, as soon as you bring me the items we agreed upon....
%dou_shopkeep% is ready to transfer ownership of his shop to you, as soon as you bring him [D|100|150|250] cases each of %c06%, %e09%, and your <user2>...

I have just come from %baghdad%, <player>, what a wonderful city! There's a wonderful coffee shop there, and I understand the proprietor, %bag_shopkeep%, may be looking for a partner. If I were to provide a recipe and an introduction, would you be willing to make some products and call on Mr. Sa'eed?

Smart move! I will give you a recipe now for %m08%. Bring [D|50|85|130] cases of these, as well as [D|50|85|130] cases of %c09% - you'll find %amaretto% in %lasvegas% - to %bag_shop% in %baghdad%. Safe travels!
Take [D|50|85|130] cases of %m08% and [D|50|85|130] cases of %c09% to %bag_shop% in %baghdad%.

Welcome to %bag_shop%, <player>. I am pleased to make your acquaintance, and look forward to a long and fruitful partnership. In exchange for the example products you have brought, I am pleased to present another recipe for a blend - %m09%. And do feel free to step inside and review my current prices...

I was sincerely hoping you'd show up on our first meeting with [D|50|85|130] cases of %m08% and %c09% for me. I don't like giving reminders, but next time you step inside my shop, I would appreciate being given said products...
You have been given instructions by %trav_06% to deliver [D|50|85|130] cases of %m08% and [D|50|85|130] cases of %c09% to %bag_shopkeep%, who you will find at %bag_shop% in %baghdad%.
Now then, I have been looking for someone to team up with here at my shop. If you are willing to do a couple of things for me, I would be eager to take you on as a partner. Are you interested?

Excellent. First, take [D|200|280|440] cases of %m09% - the recipe I myself just gave to you - to my colleague %bag_towerkeep% at %bag_tower% here in town. He will exchange the goods for another recipe, and provide further instructions.
Convey [D|200|280|440] cases of %m09% to %bag_towerkeep% at %bag_tower% in %baghdad%.
I think you will make a great partner for my friend Abrahem, <player>. Here is another valuable recipe - for %m11%.
My colleague %bag_shopkeep% led me to believe that you would be arriving with [D|200|280|440] cases of %m09% for me...
You have been given instructions by %trav_07% to deliver [D|50|85|130] cases of %m08% and [D|50|85|130] cases of %c09% to %bag_shopkeep%, who you will find at %bag_shop% in %baghdad%.

All you have to do is bring [D|200|300|460] cases of those %m11%, as well as [D|50|80|130] cases each of your <user4>, <user5>, and <user6> to %bag_shop% and Abrahem will be willing to sign the shop over to your control.
Bring [D|200|300|460] cases of %m11% and [D|50|80|130] cases each of <user4>, <user5> and <user6> to %bag_shop%.

<player>, your creations are delicious. It is my pleasure to hand over the keys to this shop - we are partners now, and you will always be offered the very best prices for your coffee creations here. I look forward to doing much business together!
I am eager to take you on as my partner, but there were certain products I was waiting to receive from you, <player>...
In order to take ownership of %bag_shop% in %baghdad%, you must show up with [D|200|300|460] cases of %m11%, as well as [D|50|80|130] cases each of <user4>, <user5> and <user6> for %bag_shopkeep%.

I am proud of how well you are doing with exotics, <player>. I have petitioned the Board, and they have agreed. We'd like to give you another 2 spaces in the recipe book for you own creations. Use them wisely!

The rest of the Board and I are very pleased with the success you've had to date with expanding the business to include blends. It is my pleasure to report that we have decided to grant you another opportunity to create your own recipe, which you will be able to do as soon as you next make your way to the Secret Test Kitchen.

You have smoothly folded the manufacture and marketing of exotic chocolates into your repertoire, <player>. I am pleased to announce that the board has opened up another couple of spaces for you in the recipe book. Good stuff!
<player>, %main_alex% is excited about the endorsements you have earned, and is eager to speak with you. I will let her know that I ran into you; expect to see her on your travels shortly...
Ah, there you are! Good news, <player>. The rest of the board and I are most pleased with all you have accomplished to date. As you know, you have been endorsed by all of the other board members.

We have been particularly impressed with your abilities to create your own recipes, and therefore feel that you are more than able to grow our company. You are now officially the %rank_4% of Baumeister Confections - a title well earned. We are also pleased to reward you with 2 additional recipe book spaces.

For my part, Sean is alive. We've got some work to do to rescue him, and I trust you are prepared to help me out. I will keep you posted.

You'll want to make sure to use those spaces and create good recipes - you'll be needing those confections soon...

You're back. You look like you've seen a ghost. Let me guess... a rumor about a parachute?

You're looking at the man who saw it. It was me. Fletcher's plane was hit hard, but I saw a chute open clear as day. I reported it, of course, but my statement got 'lost.' Officially, the sighting was deemed 'unreliable due to combat stress.' What a load of garbage.

The whole thing stank from the start. The one who pushed to bury my report was our squadron's liaison officer, a real cold fish named %evil_wolf%. He was a German defector flying for us, and he never sat right with me.

Oh, well. At least I'm glad someone like you's asking the right questions...

Welcome to Canada, . It brings me such relief to finally meet the person Alexandra has placed so much faith in. While Joseph busies himself with the machinery of business, I find myself waiting here for news... any news, really... of our missing family.

I manage the guest relations for our partners here. If you find yourself exhausted by the factories and business ventures, you are always welcome here at the %tor_hotel%.
